channel.title: Game visual freezes after short gameplay ~1-2 minutes - sounds and gameplay seem to run fine
channel.description: I'm on the public beta branch. Everytime I load any mission, the game runs a few moments and then stops at some point. The screen freezes while sounds and gameplay seem to run fine. I can still run and shoot and hear everything but the visuals froze.
